PMSC-UGR-ARTICLE.ARTICLE-ABSTRACT: Plasma cells comprise a population of terminally differentiated B cells that are dependent have many phenotypic and molecular correlates. Thus, maturation from transient plasmablast to long-lived ASCs in bone marrow is predicated on quantitative increases in Blimp-1 expression.
